emergence.targets

Class ATarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • emergence.targets.ATarget
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicTarget, ImmovableTarget

    public abstract class ATarget
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents always a target at the level. First of all you have to specify the type and after that the index. index means typesId of the object.
